div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of Feb. 6, 1892. pp 455-456. [DR. LIEBMANN ADLER'S FUNERAL]

body.p: In accordance with the wish expressed in a letter written shortly before his death, the funeral services, in honor of the highly revered and beloved teacher, Dr. Liebmann Adler, were conducted in a simple and unostentatious manner. At the grave, Dr. Moses read the prayers and Dr. Felsenthal recited the Kaddish.
